users.about: Cherie is a long time Platinum customer who has opted in to the beta version of our application. When she logs in she would see the very latest version of the application.
Philippe is one of our regular customers so he gets routed to the latest stable/active release.
Bob is an internal stake holder who wants to check our latest feature before we release it to all our users.

Julie is a customer who has reported a tricky bug, before we merge the fix into the active version of the application we want to send her to a specific build version that has the bug fix in it to see if it fixes her problem.

Aidan is teacher in Texas who is reviewing our latest reading program for adoption, we need to ensure that we do not release any new features during the review period. Therefore, we lock Aidanâ€™s account to a specific UI version for the duration of the review while continuing to release new features to our regular customers.
